column4: how am I supposed to copy my /home folder on a external HDD? I can't copy on it, nor I can use sudo (broken sudo)
everyone is going to flame me... but chmodding 777 /usr/bin was never a good idea
just to install a dependancy, since ubuntu hadn't it
fine then, I have 11.10's iso and a DVD
...I can use the live CD to copy stuff from /home to the external HDD? it works?
